info.name: Momio HD Homescreen Replacement
info.description: if you play momio with a large desktop screen (e.g. 4K), the start screen/landingpage looks totally pixelated. this replacement replaces the homescreen background with a very high resolution hd retexture and without compression artifacts.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 3 - now also includes the normal cloud background

Version 2 - now also includes the night screen

Version 1

for https://www.momio.me
